Package ohos.media.audio

Class AudioSwiftSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.audio.AudioSwiftSession

  • public class AudioSwiftSession
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a low-latency and high-performance session for applications to play pulse-code modulation (PCM) audio.

    Currently, this class is available for smart TVs only and supports only 16-bit, 48000 Hz, and dual-channel PCM data.

    Since:
    5

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static AudioSwiftSession create​(ohos.media.audio.AudioStreamInfo info)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates an AudioSwiftSession instance based on a specified AudioStreamInfo instance.
        Parameters:
        info - Indicates the AudioStreamInfo instance, which stores information about the audio stream to play, such as the sampling rate, PCM type, and channels.
        Returns:
        Returns the created AudioSwiftSession instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if info is invalid.
        Since:
        5

      • getTrack

        public AudioSwiftTrack getTrack​()
        Obtains the AudioSwiftTrack instance as the audio input track, which is used for PCM data writing.
        Returns:
        Returns the obtained AudioSwiftTrack instance.
        Since:
        5

      • open

        public boolean open​()
        Opens this AudioSwiftSession instance and initializes audio resources.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • start

        public boolean start​()
        Starts this AudioSwiftSession instance.

        PCM data can be written only after the session is started.

        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • stop

        public boolean stop​()
        Stops this AudioSwiftSession instance.

        PCM data writing fails after the session is stopped. You can write data again after calling start().

        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • close

        public boolean close​()
        Closes this AudioSwiftSession instance to release audio resources.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • write

        protected boolean write​(byte[] data,
                        int offset,
                        int size)
        Writes PCM data.

        This method can be called only after the session is started by AudioSwiftSession#start(). Currently, only 16-bit, 48000 Hz, and dual-channel PCM data is supported.

        Parameters:
        data - Indicates the PCM data to write.
        offset - Indicates the offset (in bytes) where the data writing starts.
        size - Indicates the length (in bytes) of the PCM data to write.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5
